data.title: Doğudent Dental Clinic
data.meta_description: DENTIST Dr. Dt. Deniz ÇAĞLAR He was born in 1992 in Istanbul.He was placed in the top 100 between 1 million examinees in the 2006 high school entrance exam. He graduated from Istanbul (Erkek) High School in 2011. He achieved the German High School Graduation Diploma (Abitur). He graduated from Istanbul University Faculty of Dentistry […]
data.text:
He was born in 1992 in Istanbul.

He was placed in the top 100 between 1 million examinees in the 2006 high school entrance exam. He graduated from Istanbul (Erkek) High School in 2011. He achieved the German High School Graduation Diploma (Abitur).

He graduated from Istanbul University Faculty of Dentistry in 2016. He is studying on a PhD in Periodontology, Department of Gum Diseases and Surgery at Istanbul University. He is working on his PhD thesis titled “Investigation of Wetting Properties of Blood Lipid Fractions and Antiaggregant Drugs on Titanium Surfaces with Different Surface Properties in Rabbits”.

He focuses mainly on providing pink smile aesthetics, surgical closure of gingival recessions and treatment of periodontal bone loss. He planned and implemented the treatment of countless cases.

His hobbies include cycling, technological devices, reading, growing cactus, education and cinema.

He has good command of English and German languages.

He has been working in DoğuDent Ümraniye Oral and Dental Health Polyclinic since 2019.
